Combined timeseries and climatology plots for environmental variables

Source: R/utils_boo_plot.R
pr_plot_env_var.Rd

Combined timeseries and climatology plots for environmental variables

pr_plot_env_var(df, pal = "matter", trend = "None", Scale = "identity")

Arguments

df

A dataframe from pr_get_nuts or pr_get_pigs

pal

A Palette from cmocean

trend

Trend line to be used, options None, Smoother, Linear

Scale

scale on which to plot y axis

Value

A plotly plot with timeseries and climatology at depths

Examples

df <- pr_get_nuts() %>% pr_plot_env_var()
